body_html:
I implemented the tests, they fail without the fix applied.

I added the tests also for contrib.losses.softmax_cross_entropy -- they are not strictly needed there (there was not the same error in softmax_cross_entropy), but the API offers the same guarantees for the weights in both calls.
body_text:
I implemented the tests, they fail without the fix applied.
I added the tests also for contrib.losses.softmax_cross_entropy -- they are not strictly needed there (there was not the same error in softmax_cross_entropy), but the API offers the same guarantees for the weights in both calls.
body:
I implemented the tests, they fail without the fix applied.

I added the tests also for `contrib.losses.softmax_cross_entropy` -- they are not strictly needed there (there was not the same error in `softmax_cross_entropy`), but the API offers the same guarantees for the `weights` in both calls.
